column5: Im thinking of going Oba Lake but first id like to find out if the fishing is worthwhile also how long does it take to get their on the train. Does the train leave from Hawk Junction or do you have to get on elsewhere. How much is the train fare( return).  Are the cabins clean and comfortable, do they have a screened porch??.   Any info would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks for spending the time replying......  Larry Oliver.
